agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, April 15, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn HB 714 Lucio III | et al. Relating to a reemployment program available to certain veterans placed on community supervision for a misdemeanor offense. HB 1091 Vo | et al. Relating to hiring and licensing certain veterans as peace officers. HB 1351 Cortez | et al. Relating to the confidentiality of certain information concerning service members of the United States armed forces and the state military forces. HB 3515 Fierro Relating to the requirement that a veterans county service office report to the commissioners court or the county's chief administrator. HB 4513 Hunter Relating to employing and training mental health professionals for the mental health program for veterans. HB 4514 Hunter Relating to the requirement that the Texas Veterans Commission provide training to support the veterans mental health program. HCR 91 Miller Urging Congress to enact legislation to ensure that all veterans receive in a timely manner the level of medical care that they have earned. HCR 148 Landgraf | et al. Designating June as Veteran Suicide and PTSD Awareness Month for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
